descriptionHtml:
Add follower Mea.

She is in White Run's Huntsman.

She is a magician, with lower LV lowering vanilla magic and destructive skill exceeding 50 will use exclusive attack magic.

In addition, we will give physical damage cuts to the range including ourselves by shouts used for whims.

I thank Mr Lisa Hino for giving me advice in making it.

Required case Dawnguard.

Recommended, some ENB.
